wifi-system.page-description: Here you can add more devices to your main Keenetic and organize a single wireless system with centralized management and monitoring.

header.members: Nodes included in the Wi-Fi system
header.candidates: Nodes available for adding to the Wi-Fi system

hint.node-web-interface: Click here to open node's web interface
hint.rename: Click here to rename this node
hint.switch-keenetic-to-special-mode-to-inclu: Switch Keenetic connected to this controller to 'Access point' mode to include it into the Wi-Fi system. Click on the node's row to rename a node.

rename-mws-device-popup.header-node: Enter a name for the Wi-Fi system node
rename-mws-device-popup.header-controller: Enter a name for the Wi-Fi system controller

log-table.description: Shows transitions of wireless devices between the Wi-Fi system members.
log-table.service-disabled-notice: Enable Wi-Fi system to view the transitions log

candidate-state.COMPATIBLE_UPDATE: Compatible with the System after an OS update

notice.device-controlled-by-mws: This device is administered by the Wi-Fi system {{controllerLinkOpen}}controller{{controlleLinkClose}}.
notice.parameter-controlled-by-mws: This parameter is set by the Wi-Fi system {{controllerLinkOpen}}controller{{controlleLinkClose}}.
